name: The Casino - GMTK Game Jam 2022
description: The Casino is a retro top-down, action game with a few elements of dice, board games, and losing your life to gambling! So far all the play testers have found the game really hard so if your looking for a fun, 10 minutes of hell,  this game is for you! If your not looking for that, I would still recommend trying it out because all the play testers have found it a fun time.
